DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigate effect sedentary screen time activity food intake subjective appetite 9- 14-year old normal weight overweight/obese girl . The investigator hypothesize pre-meal exposure screen time activity 45 minute increase subjective appetite food intake next meal . Food intake measure immediately follow screen-time exposure , subjective appetite measure throughout study period 0 , 15 , 30 , 45 75 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Sedentary Screen Time Activities Food Intake
DOC.criteria: healthy girl emotional , behavioral learning problem boys
